title: Stuck Level 3 Honor
body: Has anyone else been stuck at level 3 honor? I know people who have gotten less honors and played the game less get level 4 or 5 honor is this is a bug or what please help.

replies.body:
I'm still at honor 2, despite me having all 3 honor ribbons in the past at one point (for same team, I don't use allchat for the honorable opponent one)

I feel like this new system is busted.

Basically this,I seriously started thinking quitting the game at this point. It feels like shit when silver friends get lv 3-4-5 by going 0-10 and flaming passively while I try my best to please everyone while still carrying games and I'm still 2 getting shit key fragments every morning I open the client.

The system is truly busted.
I know it can feel like it can take a while, but you'll level up even if you don't receive honor.  Just keep playing, and you'll get there!
Lol problem is, my friends Level 5 honor and i've got more honors then him????

After I don't know how many months of playing daily at least 1 game and maximum around 6-7 games without even flaming or saying anything bad against those that go disco nunu because somebody banned his yasuo and those "honorable" guys are lv 3-4-5 honor while I'm lv 2. Where is the sense?

Just played a game, where all 5 in team had Honor flares on loading screen. 
4/5 had Honor level 5. And then there's me... Honor level 3. 
And two of the guys questioned me, how them. 3 silvers and a bronze. Had level 5. While I had level 3 when I'm Plat. 
I told em It was cause I'm a Support main. (At least 2500+ of my 3000+ matches are as support since season 1)  
And that the support rarely gets honored, even If I carry the game. The adc who I set up with those 20/1/20 stats. Is the one who gets honored, even though It's me whose working his ass off setting up kill after kill for him. 
The silver guy replied he was a support main aswell and he got Honor 5 just 2 weeks after honor system was released. 

Now, I still get honored. I mean, I got the honor flare in 8-9 out of 10 matches.  But I rarely get even 2 honors per game. 
I even went top lane a few times where I always had 10-20 kills and less than 5 deaths. Took tons of objectives and helped out a lot. 
But premades would just honor eachother instead of the one who saved the game that they tried to surrender at 15 min... 

This honor system really needs adjusting. 
Same with the Mastery levelling on champions, how come I can go 0/20 and win the game, and get +700-1300 points on my champion. 
But I can also go 20/0 but lose the game, and only recieve 100-200 points of mastery on the champion... 
Mastery points should be based on your Rating. S+ = 1300 points, S 1200, S- 1100. A+ 1000. etc etc. 
It shouldn't give you tons of points regardless of your score & skill level just because you won the game, and It shouldn't give next to 0 points even though you carried, got a penta. But unluckily lost by a tiny bit.

Tbh i dont think this new honor system is a good idea, most people dont even honor they skip over the page and if it is going to take forever to get honor 3 then whats the point in trying to get honor?
I reached lv 4 finnaly a day after they distributed honor reards {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I got Honor 3 two day after they release the honor system since this moment nothing else happend. I win almost everygame, always get honored 3 times and i'm still honor 3 my friends are all honor 5 and 4 and they are toxic af and keep feeding & loosing Riot the honor system is just poorly made seriously fix this...

there is no specific way to reach new honor level . i think even riot doesnt know how it happens. when people asked dev about it he gave them an  incomplete answer  i mean i have friends that plays lol 3 matches or 4 a day and they win half of it and all of them   reached lvl 5 honor but normally i play 8 or 7 matches a day or even more and my win rate is more than my friends but still i stuck in lvl 3 honor  . just dont care i think untill the  end of the season u will reach honor lvl 5 by playing lol daily anyway . goodluck
I think you will get it someday, it is not clear when but someday sure whne you get not reported
